name: Pacbase: Avoid Large Batch & TP Programs (including macros) - too many Lines of Code (-P)
description: Large entities are more difficult to read and manage. The higher number of Line of Code is 700, corresponding to three -P screens.`!xA!`The threshold for the number of lines of code is configurable at will.
rationale: Large entities are more difficult to read and manage. The higher number of Line of Code is 700, corresponding to three -P screens.`!xA!`The threshold for the number of lines of code is configurable at will.
